articles.title: Job Ad Offering Rs 1.3 Crore Salary, 20 Days Off A Month Tempts UK Doctors To Australia - NDTV
articles.description: A job advert from Blugibbon Medical Recruitment is targeting UK doctors with an accident and emergency experience
articles.content:
The advert is available on the British Medical Journal (BMJ) careers website.
Junior doctors are being lured to Australia by a job ad promising them a hefty pay cheque and 20 days off each month to … [+2101 chars]
